spreadsheet.apiKeyDescription: The default refresh interval is 60 minutes. To use a different refresh interval you must provide an API Key. For more information on how to obtain an API Key, please review the article
spreadsheet.apiKeyDescriptionLink: How to create an API Key for the Google Spreadsheet Widget.
spreadsheet.apiKeyNotValid: The API Key provided is not valid.

data.error: There was an error accessing your spreadsheet data.

public.message: To use this Google Spreadsheet it must be publicly accessible. To do this, open the Google Spreadsheet and select File > Share > Advanced, then select On - Anyone with the link.

publish.text1: To use this Google Spreadsheet it must be published to the web. To publish, open the Google Spreadsheet and select
